title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 153.5 - Certifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 153.5 - Certifications

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 653(c)

The making or filing of any New York State income tax
return, statement or other document or copy thereof required to be made or
filed pursuant to this Subchapter, including a copy of a Federal income tax
return, will constitute a certification by the person making or filing such
return, statement or other document or copy thereof that the statements
contained therein are true and that any copy filed is a true
copy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
153.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
